Sentencas: In this work, a novel combined biomass based power generation system is proposed and investigated.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The proposed integrated system consists of a combination of biomass gasifier, solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine cycle and a Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: Three different biomasses are selected: Pine Saw Dust, Municipal Solid Waste and Fowl Manure.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: A comprehensive thermoeconomic analysis as well as a multi-objective optimization is carried out.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The effects of most important operating parameters on thermodynamic performance, unit production cost and total cost rate are investigated for the overall system and components.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The operating parameters considered include biomass mass flow rate, compression ratio of air compressor, current density of solid oxide fuel cell and exit temperature of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The results show that the fuel mass flow rate and current density are the dominant factors affecting the variation of energy and exergy efficiencies as well as unit production cost.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: Moreover, the best thermodynamic and economic performances are corresponded to the Pine Saw Dust fueled system.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle

Sentencas: Nevertheless, the best environmental performance is related to the Fowl Manure fueled system mainly due to the lowest content of CO2 in flue gas leaving the system to the atmosphere.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic assessment of a novel integrated biomass based power generation system including gas turbine cycle, solid oxide fuel cell and Rankine cycle
